settings.title: Step 1
settings.text: Visit our website at https://wholesale.albeliekam.com and go through our wide range of Sarees, Kurta Sets and Unstitched Suits.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.text: Go to the Join as Reseller tab on the website and fill out all the details given in the Reseller Application Form.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text: Once your application is reviewed by our team, you can start selling with Albeli Ekam, whether you are a reseller, retailer or wholesaler.

Wholesale Women Clothing At Albeli Ekam

Albeli Ekam is Kolkata's first women's clothing marketplace for retailers, wholesalers, distributors, exporters and suppliers. You can buy bulk wholesale women clothing online. What makes us unique is our wide range Indian ethnic wear and quality products, available at cheap and reasonable prices.

Kurtis & Kurtas for Women

Indian Kurtis – The go to attire of every Indian Girl, be it pairing it up with jeans and stepping out to college, choosing
neutral coloured ones to wear to work, or pair them up with a churidar and heavy junk jewel pieces to grace a festive
occasion, Indian Kurtas are every wardrobe must-have. At Albeli Ekam, we share your obsession with Kurtas and pairing
it up in a multitude of ways, and have a collection you cannot get enough of. From subtle minimal ones to embroidered
heavens, we have a collection traveling all corners of ethnic fashion. So it does not matter what aesthetic you resonate
with, you will find something that suits your outlook here.
One of the most common additions to every girl’s wardrobe, these appeal to women across generations because of their
fashionable outlook and comfort quotient. Equal parts loved by the generations of our mothers, ourselves, and our
daughters, Kurtis are a no-brainer. India’s weather also plays a perfect companion for this attire. So whether you are
looking for an ethnic wear to work on a daily basis, or you are in a mood to drench in junk-jewelleries head to toe and
click some aesthetic snaps for your social media, Kurtis understands the assignment.
At Albeli Ekam, we have the latest collection of kurtis for women with us and our site is regularly updated to keep up with
the latest trends, so your fashion express never arrives at a halt.

Buy Ethnic And Designer Shararas at Albeli Ekam

Festive season is here, and so is our urge to showcase all flares and twirl. What better to do that than a dazzling Sharara.
Stylish, Comfortable, Chique, Shararas are a festival favorite amongst millennials and GenZs for all the right reasons. From
long kurtas to embroidered crop tops and shrugs, these dazzling outfits make any ensemble phenomenal and at Albeli
Ekam, we have innumerable Sharara Designs to choose from.

Super-stylish and comfy festive attires like sharara suits, sharara dresses or sharara crop top outfits are what you will
completely love to go for, and we have plenty of choices to spoil you. No matter what aesthetic you gravitate towards, you
will find something that suits your finesse.

Buy Sarees Online At Albeli Ekam

There might be a plethora of options when it comes to choosing the best ethnic wear for traditional events, wedding
functions, or festivals, but the timelessness this six feet of pure grace provides is unparalleled. With myriads of options to
choose from, whether you like a minimal, toned down appeal, or a royal one, sarees will give you exactly what you want.
As Vogue says, when you wear a saree, you become them and they become you.

Here, At Albeli Ekam, we have sarees in a plethora of categories, from Silk to Organza, to Georgette, in all the colors you
can possibly imagine in premium qualities. Well, we take pride in spoiling you for choice, and we know your wardrobe
deserves these timeless pieces.
